wellcome.help_one: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

helping.Introduce1: Political, electoral, and religious activities on the YumYarn social network are prohibited.
helping.Introduce2: Posting content for criminal purposes or promoting criminal acts is prohibited.
helping.Prohibited_Actions1: Posts containing profanity, discrimination, or ethical issues are prohibited.
helping.Prohibited_Actions2: Posts causing distress or negatively affecting other users are prohibited.
helping.Inappropriate_content2: Publishing personal information without the consent of the individual involved is prohibited.
helping.Identity_and_Privacy1: Posts containing misleading or false information are prohibited.
helping.Identity_and_Privacy2: Posting defamatory content about individuals, companies, nations, or specific regions is prohibited.
helping.Slanderous_content1: Impersonating individuals, organizations, or YumYarn is prohibited.
helping.Slanderous_content2: Advertising one's own products, stores, companies, or other commercial content is prohibited.
helping.Violation_of_law_and_ethics1: Acts violating copyright, trademark, portrait rights, user privacy, or the rights of third parties or YumYarn are prohibited.
helping.Advertising_and_commerce1: Posts introducing personal products, stores, or companies containing advertising or other commercial content are prohibited.
helping.Spam_and_Malware1: Actions interfering with the management of the YumYarn social network are prohibited.
helping.Intervention_and_management1: Other actions deemed inappropriate by YumYarn or Ajinomoto Co., Inc. are prohibited.
